attributes.comment:
I beg you to reconsider raising the fees for these applications. I am a single
mother who has adopted one daughter from Vietnam and I am in the process of
adopting a second daughter (a 10 yr old girl) also from Vietnam. The adoption
process is already so expensive, and I have saved for years to make this second
adoption happen. There are so many kids out there who need homes, and this will
make it even more difficult for their families who want to adopt them to bring them
home. It seems to me like this is a bias against International adoption, because
people who adopt domestically don't have to pay these expenses. Please
reconsider these changes.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Laurie O'Neill
